```js
// Button.stories.js

import Button from './Button.svelte';

export default {
  component: Button,
  //ðŸ‘‡ Enables auto-generated documentation for the component story
  tags: ['autodocs'],
  argTypes: {
    backgroundColor: { control: 'color' },
  },
};

export const Primary = {
  render: (args) => ({
    Component: Button,
    props: args,
  }),
  args: {
    primary: true,
    label: 'Button',
  },
};

export const Secondary = {
  render: (args) => ({
    Component: Button,
    props: args,
  }),
  args: {
    ...Primary.args,
    primary: false,
  },
};
```
